ai_sprite.name: guard2
ai_sprite.dialog: We have a new king now. You are not welcome here. Now run along before we spill your blood right here.

ai_sprite.name: guard2
ai_sprite.dialog: We have a new king now. You are not welcome here. Now run along before we spill your blood right here.

ai_sprite.name: old_man2
ai_sprite.dialog: Hit the shops now while you can. The people here don't like you and they probably won't let you back into the city again.

ai_sprite.name: gentleman2
ai_sprite.dialog: You have corrupted many of our people. Don't think that this will go unanswered.

ai_sprite.name: woman4
ai_sprite.dialog: A new king has taken Mathoni's place. He is already stirring up our people to anger against the Nephites. Please be careful.

ai_sprite.name: yuppie2
ai_sprite.dialog: Have you heard of the tactic Double Tap? Use it on an ally, and for each subsequent physical attack he will have a 50 percent chance of hitting a 2nd time.

ai_sprite.name: woman5
ai_sprite.dialog: There are other Nephite cities northeast of here.

ai_sprite.name: villager3
ai_sprite.dialog: There is a cavity of a rock to the southeast that is said to contain impressive treasures, but the warriors in that area are unbelievably strong and numerous.
